title: nf-core/nanoraredx pipeline - params.input schema
description: Schema for the file provided with params.input

sample_id.errorMessage: Sample ID must be provided and cannot contain spaces

bam_dir.description: Directory containing unaligned BAM files for this sample
bam_dir.help_text: Directory path containing unaligned BAM files. Used when --align_with_bam is enabled.

fastq_dir.description: Directory containing FASTQ files for this sample
fastq_dir.help_text: Directory path containing FASTQ files (.fastq.gz or .fq.gz). Used when --align_with_fastq is enabled.

aligned_bam.help_text: Full path to a pre-aligned BAM file. The corresponding .bai index file must exist in the same directory. Used when neither --align_with_fastq nor --align_with_bam are enabled.

methyl_bam.description: Path to BAM file with methylation information
methyl_bam.help_text: Full path to a BAM file containing methylation calls. Required when --methyl is enabled and --align_with_bam is not used. The corresponding .bai index file must exist in the same directory.

hpo_terms.help_text: Human Phenotype Ontology terms in the format HP:0000000. Multiple terms should be separated by semicolons. Leave empty if no HPO terms are available.
